overview:
Nicolas Catard, 38, is a program manager, music and video producer, based in Paris. He has been called “most famous job seeker in France in 2009” after his singing video cv created one of the most famous buzz on the web that same year.

Between 2006 and 2009, he was managing the MSN Video plateform for France. In 2009, he was hired by Endemol France as Digital Program Manager, working on iPhone and web project. Since 2010, he’s working at Proximity BBDO Paris, as technical consultant.

Since 2009, he managing NutInAShell, a small production startup, producing content for the web, including, music video, editorial content for companies such as Monster Worldwide or Yahoo France.
